name: react-toastify

scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c && npm run style
scripts.clean: rimraf cjs/* && rimraf dist/* && rimraf esm/*
scripts.style: npm run sass && npm run sass-minimal && cssnano dist/ReactToastify.css dist/ReactToastify.min.css --no-zindex --no-reduceIdents
